episodes.title: Investigating The Internet's Deadliest Cult
episodes.description:
This documentary investigates a growing, harmful internet community that promotes eating disorders. This video is not intended to promote or glorify eating disorders, but instead aims to provide a researched commentary on the activities that a collection of internet groups engage in, and the harmful behaviors they encourage. 

Please do not attempt to recreate any of the harmful behaviors mentioned in this video, and instead refer to the links at the top of this description for support in facing eating/mental use disorders. Thank you.

Chapters:
0:00 Creators Note
1:37 Intro
3:17 A Growing Problem
7:32 Discovering an Online Community
13:59 Their Summoning Ritual
21:44 Going Deeper
23:22 A Dark Secret
24:26 The Depths of a Cult
29:18 Awareness is needed

Welp, that's it... what are you still doing down here

episodes.title: The Japanese Cult That Produces Video Games
episodes.description:
Aum Shinrikyo is the Japanese cult responsible for the famous train attack of 1995. However, Aum Shinrikyo has an interesting past, unlike other cults. Aum Shinrikyo took part in many marketing schemes regarding trending media. This includes magazines, comics, anime, and even video games.

The journey follows Shoko Asahara and his development of the religious cult Aum Shinrikyo. Watch as we uncover the story of the leader and his devoted following.

Credit to the video below for much of the footage used
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xR_FrDbud1E

Chapters
0:00 Intro
2:33 Sakamoto Family Murder
4:05 Chouetsu Sekai
7:40 1995 Japan Train Attack
8:45 The Story of Kamikuishiki Village + More
14:42 Outro

Like what I post? I cover scary and unsettling levels and moments in games. If you want to see more content like this, feel free to hit that subscribe button and turn on notifications. That way you get instant updates and never miss a post!

Follow my Twitter 
https://twitter.com/Pixels_AD

I hope you enjoyed :) I look forward to hearing from the community, so feel free to leave any requests or recommendations in the comments.

Welp, that's it... what are you still doing down here
